page.title: 17WILMINGTON - LIFESTYLE 1
page.content:
Wilmington has a variety of housing for such a relatively small village. Recently two new estates have been built with houses ranging from 65,000 to 90,000 pounds. There is a small estate of Council property which occupies the centre of the village. The elderly are catered for in two residential homes and a retired homes dwelling area. A recent investigation by a local school showed the following results:- 1)80% of the houses are privately owned 2)Most are semi-detached or detached 3)Most have 2,3 or 4 bedrooms 4)50% of occupations are Professional 5)Others work with manual services 6)By far the greatest majority travel to work by car.
The Wilmington Memorial Hall provides a centre for village functions (Cont..)
